translations: v.组成，构成；作曲；撰写（信、诗或演讲稿）；使镇静，使平静；为（照片、图像）构图；排版，排稿

sentences.sentence: Protein molecules compose all the complex working parts of living cells.
sentences.translation: 蛋白质分子构成了活细胞所有复杂的工作部件。

sentences.sentence: He started at once to compose a reply to Anna.
sentences.translation: 他立刻开始给安娜写回信。
